name: Pordol
description:
A short 2D puzzle-platformer inspired by Portal. Use your pordol gun (patent pending) to traverse each room as fast as possible and escape your robot captor, D-0! 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my first game and is part of my game a month challenge I'm doing throughout the year. Thanks for playing!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Full controls are: A and S to move, W and D to look up or down, Left click to shoot, E to interact. Have fun!
